DataRetentionPolicy.description:
A data retention policy for application version artifacts.
Artifacts are ordered in descending order of their upload date and an artifact will be targeted for clean up if it satisfies at least one rule.
Rule 1: If the artifact exceeds the maximum artifacts limit (after excluding artifacts of age less than or equal to min days threshold).
Rule 2: If the artifact exceeds the maximum age threshold (except if removing it would also reduce the artifact count below min artifacts threshold).
